title: My R button sometimes won't work (video included)
body:
Excuse the profanity/bad editing/weird noises. I initially made it to show my friend.
Any ideas?

replies.body:
I'm going to help you fix this because that collab was was literally the best thing I've seen all day xD The first two things that come to mind are:

1. Have you already tried [**Repairing Your Client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article)? 
2. Have you already tried reinstalling your mouse drivers? 

Nice video, and keep me updated!
